review: Works just as advertised. I got tired of trying to access Amazon Prime via my Playstation 3 so when I saw the Fire Stick at $39, I went for it. It showed up promptly and I was up and running in no time.I inserted the Fire Stick into the HDMI Slot 2 in my AV Receiver instead of the TV, using the dongle and power supply provided. Next, I went into the software for my Logitech Harmony One Universal Remote. I added the Fire Stick as a device, and then created an Activity called "Watch Amazon Prime". I told the Remote it was in HDMI 2 and that was it. Once the software updated the Remote, I just pointed it at the Receiver, selected "Watch Amazon Prime", and the Fire Stick launched me from DirecTV right into Fire Stick Network Setup. It found my Wireless Network, I entered the PW, and away we went. The whole thing took less than 10 minutes. Sweet!
